title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB:
Reproducing the steps in 1GEWMOZ: ITPUI:WIN2000Scripted resource editor example opens an XML file by default.

1. Create a new basic project.
2. Create a new file named test.xml.
3. The editor used is the scripted resource editor example, which completely ignores the XML file content.
4. In the Navigator, select test.xml.
5. Right-click and choose 'Open With...'.
6. Select 'Default Text Editor'.

observed: Nothing happens; it reactivates the scripted resource editor example.

When searching for an existing open file, the editor should also consider the editor types. It should open a new editor on the file because the editor type is different.
